results.title: Did You Wonder Who Fired the Gun?
results.original_title: Did You Wonder Who Fired the Gun?
results.overview: “In 1946, my great-grandfather murdered a black man named Bill Spann and got away with it.” So begins Travis Wilkerson’s critically acclaimed documentary, DID YOU WONDER WHO FIRED THE GUN?, which takes us on a journey through the American South to uncover the truth behind a horrific incident and the societal mores that allowed it to happen. Acting as narrator and guide, Wilkerson spins a strange, frightening tale, incorporating scenes from TO KILL A MOCKINGBIRD, the music of Janelle Monáe and Phil Ochs, and the story of Rosa Parks’ investigation into the Recy Taylor case, as well as his own family history, for a gripping investigation into our collective past and its echoes into the present day.

results.title: Lost in Florence
results.original_title: Lost in Florence
results.overview: Eric Lazard is a heartbroken former college football star who gets involved in a dangerous Florentine sport and a local woman, Stephanie, while visiting his cousin Anna, who lives in Italy and teaches the Italian language to foreigners.

results.title: Reassemblage: From the Firelight to the Screen
results.original_title: Reassemblage: From the Firelight to the Screen
results.overview: Via Chris Damitio:"On the surface level, the film is about the women of Senegal and the way they live. This is, however, simply one layer on a veritable onion of a psychological experiment that Trinh is conducting on her audience. Using a diverse bag of tricks, she leads the viewer to multiple rabbit holes that are filled with self reflexive mirrors that not only examine where she is coming from and going to as a film maker, but also what we, as the audience, are seeing, thinking, and even feeling."

results.title: Oscar Arias: Without a Shot Fired
results.original_title: Oscar Arias: Without a Shot Fired
results.overview: This is the story of a tiny country that made a decision to do something that no other country had ever done -- it decided to abolish its army and declare peace to the world. And this is the story of a young boy who grew up in that country, and how he ended up challenging -- and sometimes even convincing -- the greatest powers in the world to follow Costa Rica's example. "Oscar Arias: Without a Shot Fired" is a Don Quixote-like saga with great historical touchstones -- Ronald Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev, Cold War politics and Communism, Central American War and Peace. It follows a slight, academic, and most unlikely hero over the course of more than fifty years, as he travels the world in a quest to stop the spread of the weapons of war. In the end, it is a story about the triumph of reason, of the sparrow triumphing over the eagle, and how the impossible dream can sometimes come true.

results.title: D.A.F.T.: A Story About Dogs, Androids, Firemen and Tomatoes
results.original_title: D.A.F.T.: A Story About Dogs, Androids, Firemen and Tomatoes
results.overview: A strange combination of techno and New Wave music, the French duo Daft Punk caused an international dance sensation with their catchy hit "Around The World." This fantastic French import showcases the fact that the duo's innovation carries over to the video realm from the musical one. D.A.F.T. features their first four famous videos -- "Da Funk," "Around The World," "Burnin," and "Revolution 909."

results.title: The Firefly
results.original_title: Ang Alitaptap
results.overview: Short film made for Venezia 70 – Future Reloaded

results.title: Fireman Sam: Heroes of the Storm
results.original_title: Fireman Sam: Heroes of the Storm
results.overview: Fireman Sam and his team are on a mission to save Pontypandy! When a hurricane threatens the town, emergencies pop up everywhere... from saving the Wildmen of Pontypandy to rescuing a group from the flooding mines to protecting their new fire station. With new recruits, a new station, and a new vehicle, these ultimate heroes are always ready to save the day!

results.title: Playmobil: Guardians of the Dragon Fires
results.original_title: Playmobil: Guardians of the Dragon Fires
results.overview: For many years, the Dragon Guardians have been watching over the sacred fires of the ancient dragons Remur and Raganur.  Then, the greedy warrior, Dragon, steals the fire of Remur and captures one of the guardians.  An exciting rescue begins...

results.title: The Firefly
results.original_title: Svetlyachok
results.overview: Story of a firefly

results.title: Firestorm Over Dresden Germany: A Real Holocaust
results.original_title: Firestorm Over Dresden Germany: A Real Holocaust
results.overview: Taking into account the latest historical evidence, this documentary attempts to shed new light on the bombing of Dresden, one of the most controversial raids of World War 2. Contemporary witnesses, previously unheard, describe the events and the terror of what it was like to be in Dresden through the night of bombing.

results.title: Muse at Firefly Music Festival 2017
results.original_title: Muse at Firefly Music Festival 2017
results.overview: Muse at Firefly Music Festival 2017

results.title: Firemen's Ball
results.original_title: Le bal des pompiers
results.overview: The history of the Greek family between 1940 and 1944, which recounts the major events of World War II: the German occupation, the resistance, and the liberation ...

results.title: Like fireflies
results.original_title: Lucciole per lanterne
results.overview: In 1981, Pinochet privatized almost all of Chile’s water resources and in the following thirty years the rights to their water were sold to large companies and corporations for producing hydroelectric power. Now the construction of five large dams on the Pascua and Baker rivers is threatening Chilean Patagonia.

results.title: Mike the Knight: The Fireless Dragon
results.original_title: Mike the Knight: The Fireless Dragon
results.overview: Sparkie decides to stop breathing fire after he ruins Mrs Piecrust's dragonberry pies! But Mike and Squirt need his fire-breathing skills to help them find some more dragonberries to make new ones.

results.title: Danger Danger Live at Firefest 2012
results.original_title: Danger Danger Live at Firefest 2012
results.overview: Danger Danger, featuring Ted Poley and Bruno Ravel, performing at Firefest IX on Sunday 21st of October 2012, at Rock City, Nottingham, in the United Kingdom.  Setlist: Rock America Beat the Bullet Shot o' Love Killin' Love Don't Walk Away Don't Blame It on Love Hearts on the Highway Feels Like Love Bang Bang I Still Think About You Crazy Nites  Encore: Monkey Business Naughty Naughty

results.title: Coney Hatch: Live at Firefest 2011
results.original_title: Coney Hatch: Live at Firefest 2011
results.overview: On Sunday, 23rd October 2011, Coney Hatch made their debut UK appearance at Firefest 2011, at legendary venue Nottingham Rock City, and blew the roof off the house.

results.title: Fireman Sam: Danger By The Double
results.original_title: Fireman Sam: Danger By The Double
results.overview: FIREMAN SAM HAS DOUBLE THE CHALLENGE IN HIS LATEST EXCITING ADVENTURES ! James and Sarah are always competing with each other, but when a tree in the forest is hit by lightning, will they stop in time to realise the dangers in front of them ? Fortunately for the troublesome twosome, the Hero Next Door is on hand, with a little help from Radar, to sniff out the twins and guide them back to safety.

results.title: Fireplace for your Home: Christmas Music
results.original_title: Fireplace for your Home: Christmas Music
results.overview: Our #1 Seller, enjoy the sounds of a crackling fireplace mixed with tasteful renditions of all-time Holiday favorites such as Jingle Bells, and Joy to the World.

results.title: Fireman Sam: The New Hero Next Door
results.original_title: Fireman Sam: The New Hero Next Door
results.overview: More adventures featuring everyone's favourite animated Welsh fireman. Episodes comprise: 'Paper Plane Down', 'Hot and Cold Running', 'Sniffer Dog', 'Hearts On Fire', 'Perilous Path' and 'New Hero Next Door'

results.title: Cradle Of Filth: Peace Through Superior Firepower
results.original_title: Cradle Of Filth: Peace Through Superior Firepower
results.overview: Peace Through Superior Firepower is the name of Cradle of Filth's 2005 music DVD released through Roadrunner Records. The title references the popular T-shirt slogan featured in the 1986 film Aliens. The DVD contains a full concert filmed on 2 April 2005 at Elysée Montmartre, Paris. It also contains six music videos and extra features including footage of a signing session and a "Shockumentary".
